short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set timer, blacklist browser/urls, alarm and make Todos for your tasks and be a PROMAN.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Popup contains.....
Users can see their browsing time as popup badge text or inside popup.
Users can set alarm to get the notification on time.
Users can set the target time to take some break from browsing, during break all sites or we say whole browser will be blocked.
After break users can unblock the browser (button in the popup).

Options contains.....
Users can blacklist the time wasting sites they find, just copy and paste url and click block.
Users can also make their todos and get notified when task is going to change into ongoing status.

So, wanna be a PROMAN ? just use it....
